F

FixedAmountRow - Class in <Unnamed>
FixedAmountRow is an abstraction of ScoreRow that implements the score calculations in FixedAmountRow.calculateScore(Dice) for all its sub-classes.

Represent scoring for rows with a fixed score.

SumAllRow is an abstraction of ScoreRow that generalizes the score calculations in SumAllRow.calculateScore(Dice).
SumAllRow(String) - Constructor for class SumAllRow
Represent rows who's score is the sum of dices.
